reviewText: I put this on a 50 inch TV and had it running all evening long at a Halloween Party.  I was surprised at how many ladies stopped to look at it, and then sat down to watch it.  The men loved it and the fact that the ladies liked it.  In the next room couples were dancing and some of the ladies were trying to dance like the shadow dancers.  Perfect for Halloween since the main dancer has horns like a female devil.

I use (sometimes) Shadow Dancers at my DJ gigs when I DJ the proper place not going to use these at a graduation party I have a projection unit and put this on a rear projection screen (like a bed sheet) and looks nice.

Hot hot hot!! It was only a matter of time of finding this gem. Purchasing Volume 9 from the Shadow Dancers will turn up the heat at any party with a mix of upbeat and sexy club beats and sensual imagery that has a little something for everyone, no matter what your tastes are. It really is a perfect blend of satisfaction and seduction all wrapped up for your ultimate pleasure!

Totally worth it.

What this is is basically "sexy" chicks dancing as just shadows in colorful backgrounds.  has a dancy little soundtrack too.

Personally its really cool to have on in the background, and the video is totally seamlessly loop-able.  If you never seen any of the shadow dancers this  and Busty girls are pretty good to get started with.

Because of the BLACK SHADOWS on colorful backgrounds i am able to completely change the background with whatever i please with a Chroma key on my Edirol v-4 (video mixer)

Really professional and really well produced.

i will be totally honest i found this as a torrent first and when i find something that is Quality i ALWAYS PURCHASE it.
And almost every dvd of the Shadow Dancers has been this level of quality and production.

Having a party with a bunch of monitors?
own a venue and you want something for people to look at, then pick this up!  you will not be disappointed!
If you want something just a little Dirtier i recommend :

Shadow Dancers Vol 4. Mistress Kiki's Fetish Temptation
pretty similar just a little dirtier.
Amazon ignored my complaint about corrupt download. I never received any download to this product. Though my digital media libray has 107 items in it
If you are having a fancy dress party, toga party or it's halloween and you want to set a sexy fun and playful vibe, then this is the must have DVD, Auto loops for all night play.
sounds like all the parties i go to!  this one is great for halloween costume parties.
